description: This file provides frontend configuration utilities for API base URL determination and a health check mechanism. It includes functions to normalize URLs, resolve the API base URL with a priority order, perform a health check on the backend API endpoint, and initialize health status checks on app startup.

methods.name: normalizeBase(maybe)
methods.description: Normalizes a given string to ensure it looks like an absolute URL, returning null otherwise.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Resolves and returns the base URL for API calls based on various sources with defined priority: window override, environment variable, same-origin, or fallback URL.

methods.name: checkHealth(apiBase = getApiBase())
methods.description: Performs a health check against the backend API's health endpoint, returning true if healthy and false otherwise.

methods.name: initHealthCheck(onStatus)
methods.description: Initiates a health check when the app loads and executes a callback with the result.
